quotes.quote: In a mad world only the mad are sane.
quotes.author: Akira Kurosawa

quotes.quote: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The knowing, I told myself, is only a vapor of the mind, and yet it can wreck havok with one's sanity.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Sometimes the mind, for reasons we don't necessarily understand, just decides to go to the store for a quart of milk.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: Insanity in individuals is something rare - but in groups, parties, nations and epochs, it is the rule.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Correct me if I'm wrong, but hasn't the fine line between sanity and madness gotten finer?
quotes.author: George Price

quotes.quote: Ordinarily he was insane, but he had lucid moments when he was merely stupid.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Truly great madness cannot be achieved without significant intelligence.
quotes.author: Henrik Tikkanen

quotes.quote: When dealing with the insane, the best method is to pretend to be sane.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Part of being sane, is being a little bit crazy.
quotes.author: Janet Long

quotes.quote: Sanity calms, but madness is more interesting.
quotes.author: John Russell

quotes.quote: I think that maybe in every company today there is always at least one person who is going crazy slowly.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: A neurosis is a secret that you don't know you are keeping.
quotes.author: Kenneth Tynan

quotes.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
quotes.author: Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: I don't really trust a sane person.
quotes.author: Lyle Alzado

quotes.quote: There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: There is only one difference between a madman and me. I am not mad.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote:
Joel: Ed, are you hallucinating?
Ed: Oh, yeah, but not right now.
quotes.author: Sy Rosen and Christian Williams

quotes.quote: Howard Hughes was able to afford the luxury of madness, like a man who not only thinks he is Napoleon but hires an army to prove it.
quotes.author: Ted Morgan

quotes.quote: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives.
quotes.author: William Dement

quotes.quote:
Canst thou not minister to a mind diseased,
Pluck from the memory a rooted sorrow...
And with some sweet oblivious antidote
Cleanse the stuff'd bosom of that perilous stuff
Which weighs upon the heart?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fetter strong madness in a silken thread.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Her madness hath the oddest frame of sense, such a dependency of thing on thing, as e'er I heard in madness.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: How comes it, that thou art then estranged from thyself?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Madness in great ones must not unwatch'd go.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
